channel.title: Pop Creations Podcast Show!
channel.description: Pop Creations is an innovative music production company and record label.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Sing it, Record it, Make It!
channel.itunes:author: Pop Creations
channel.itunes:summary: Pop Creations is an innovative music production company and record label.

item.title: Episode 2 - Pelle Lidell - Universal Music Publishing
item.description: Steve Foster talks with Pelle Lidell, probably one of the all time most successful music publishers ever! Now at Universal Music Publishing Pelle talks about how he started in the music business, then went on to build Murlyn, a swedish music production company selling in excess of 80 million records! This podcast is an education for anyone in, or trying to get into the music business
item.dc:creator: Pop Creations
item.itunes:summary:
Steve Foster talks with Pelle Lidell, probably one of the all time most successful music publishers ever!
Now at Universal Music Publishing Pelle talks about how he started in the music business, then went on to build Murlyn, a swedish music production company selling in excess of 80 million records!
This podcast is an education for anyone in, or trying to get into the music business

item.title: Pop Creations - Start Your Own Pop Career - Episode 1
item.description: In this first episode Steven Foster from Pop Creations introduces the company. If you have ever written your own song, it features a fantastic competition to get your song fully produced by one of Pop Creations chart producers. Email the show info@pop-creations.com or see us at pop-creations.com
